variable.name: CASE_CONTROL
variable.value: Control with Change in Cognitive Status

variable.name: FAMID
variable.comment: The original intent was to optionally collect data from biological relatives with Alzheimer's and unaffected siblings of AD cases but as this was not a required component of the study very little pedigree data was collected. In review, the data collected is very sparse and incomplete.

variable.name: SBFAMRL
variable.comment: Additional Primary Key field The original intent was to optionally collect data from biological relatives with Alzheimer's and unaffected siblings of AD cases but as this was not a required component of the study very little pedigree data was collected. In review, the data collected is very sparse and incomplete.
